review: I absolutely love my Fire TV Stick.  It works seamlessly with my Prime membership.  I can fast forward 10 seconds at a time.  If I'm watching a series, I have the option to go straight to the next episode.  The remote is easy to use.  Amazon has great suggestions for me based on what I've watched already. It connects to my Netflix account. But probably the coolest thing is, when you pause your show, it shows you at the bottom of the screen the names of all the actors who are in that shot.  How many times have you sat on the couch trying to figure out the name of an actor?? Just press pause and the Fire Stick does the thinking for you.  Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
